attributes.action: Sack every member of the undemocratic, tyrannical House of Commons. Start again!
attributes.background: After the vote yesterday and the obvious ambitions of the elected elite to stop brexit, we need to show them how democracy works! I voted to leave, the UK voted  to leave. But our elected shambles in the HOC have hogtied brexit to the point where the money men remainers will win.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
